entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:29 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:29 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
